statements: SELECT * FROM employee_training_certification;
SELECT employee_name, training_program FROM employee_training_certification WHERE certification_status = true;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name FROM employee_training_certification WHERE training_program = 'SQL Basics';
SELECT * FROM employee_training_certification WHERE employee_id = 1001;
SELECT employee_name, certification_status FROM employee_training_certification WHERE certification_status = false;
SELECT * FROM employee_training_certification WHERE certification_status = TRUE ORDER BY employee_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, training_program FROM employee_training_certification WHERE certification_status = TRUE AND employee_id > 100 ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_name, training_program, certification_status FROM employee_training_certification WHERE training_program LIKE '%Java%' AND certification_status = FALSE;
SELECT employee_name FROM employee_training_certification WHERE certification_status = TRUE OR training_program = 'Python' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id, training_program FROM employee_training_certification WHERE certification_status = TRUE AND employee_name LIKE 'S%' ORDER BY training_program DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM employees;
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM employees WHERE employee_id IN (2, 3);
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT employee_id, certification_name FROM employees JOIN certifications ON employees.employee_id = certifications.employee_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_certifications, employee_id FROM certifications GROUP BY employee_id HAVING total_certifications > 1;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE hire_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, certification_expiry_date FROM certifications WHERE certification_expiry_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY employee_name ASC;
SELECT training_name, training_date FROM trainings WHERE training_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM employees ORDER BY employee_name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'HR' ORDER BY employee_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM trainings WHERE training_date > '2022-01-01';

SELECT employee_name, certification_name FROM employees INNER JOIN certifications ON employees.employee_id = certifications.employee_id WHERE certifications.certification_expiry_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY employee_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT employee_name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE hire_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' AND department != 'IT' ORDER BY hire_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Employees;
SELECT employee_id, hire_date FROM Employees ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Trainings WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT certification_name, organization, expiration_date FROM Certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM Employees WHERE first_name = 'John' AND last_name = 'Doe';
SELECT training_name, start_date, end_date FROM Trainings WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT certification_name, organization, expiration_date FROM Certifications WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, t.training_name FROM Employees e JOIN EmployeeTrainings et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id JOIN Trainings t ON et.training_id = t.training_id;

SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, COUNT(et.training_id) AS NumTrainings FROM Employees e LEFT JOIN EmployeeTrainings et ON e.employee_id = et.employee_id GROUP BY e.first_name, e.last_name HAVING NumTrainings > 2 ORDER BY NumTrainings DESC;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT';
SELECT employee_id, first_name, last_name FROM employees ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT certification_name, expiration_date FROM certifications WHERE expiration_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT course_name, instructor, duration_hours FROM training_courses WHERE duration_hours >= 20;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'IT' ORDER BY hire_date DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, department FROM employees WHERE department IN ('HR', 'Finance') ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT e.first_name, e.last_name, c.certification_name FROM employees e JOIN certifications c ON e.employee_id = c.employee_id WHERE c.expiration_date < DATE('now');
SELECT tc.course_name, tc.instructor, et.date_completed FROM training_courses tc JOIN employee_training et ON tc.course_id = et.course_id WHERE et.employee_id = 101 ORDER BY date_completed;
SELECT tp.provider_name, tp.contact_email FROM training_providers tp WHERE tp.contact_email LIKE '%@example.com' AND tp.contact_phone LIKE '+1%';
